titleStmt.title: A vindication of the late reverend and learned John Owen D.D. by a friendly scrutiny into the merits, and manner of Mr. Rich. Baxters opposition to twelve arguments concerning worship by the lyturgy, said to be Dr. Owens / by a hearty friend to all good men, and of the unity of the spirit in the bond of peace.
titleStmt.author: Hearty friend to all good men.

notesStmt.note: "A friendly scrutiny into the grounds of Mr. Richard Baxters treatment of Dr. John Owen deceased, and the manner of it, in his examination of twelve arguments, never printed; but, according to Mr. Baxters title of his book, said to be Dr. Owens. In a letter to Mr. Baxter ... "--Caption, p. 1.
